name: Tower Fall(ing)
description: A game made by Pranav Krishna Kumar (me) for the 2022 NCSU VGDC Fall Game Jam. The theme of the jam was "Fall", hence the game about stuff falling. Created as a way to explore the various elements of unity that I hadn't been acquainted with from past game projects such as the Unity Timelines and Animations. Made entirely for fun with 0 seriousness factor involved and I hope you enjoy :D.
